databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_NIYAKU.MS_NIYAKU_ID, MS_NIYAKU.MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME, MS_NIYAKU.KANKAKU, MS_NIYAKU.DELETE_FLAG, MS_NIYAKU.SEND_FLAG, MS_NIYAKU.VESSEL_ID, MS_NIYAKU.DATA_NO, MS_NIYAKU.USER_KEY, MS_NIYAKU.RENEW_DATE, MS_NIYAKU.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_NIYAKU.TS FROM MS_NIYAKU where MS_NIYAKU.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_NIYAKU.MS_NIYAKU_ID, MS_NIYAKU.MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME, MS_NIYAKU.KANKAKU, MS_NIYAKU.DELETE_FLAG, MS_NIYAKU.SEND_FLAG, MS_NIYAKU.VESSEL_ID, MS_NIYAKU.DATA_NO, MS_NIYAKU.USER_KEY, MS_NIYAKU.RENEW_DATE, MS_NIYAKU.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_NIYAKU.TS FROM MS_NIYAKU WHERE MS_NIYAKU.MS_NIYAKU_ID = :MS_NIYAKU_ID

INSERT INTO MS_NIYAKU( MS_NIYAKU_ID, MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME, KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_NIYAKU_ID, :MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME, :KANKAKU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_NIYAKU SET MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME = :MS_NIYAKUSETUBI_NAME, KANKAKU = :KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_NIYAKU_ID = :MS_NIYAKU_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
